repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.5 
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1 
RUN mkdir /dj_app 
WORKDIR /dj_app 
COPY ./dj_app/requirements.txt /dj_app/ 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
EXPOSE 8000 9191 
COPY ./dj_app/app-entrypoint.sh / 
ENTRYPOINT ["/app-entrypoint.sh"] 
CMD ["--socket", ":8000"]
